ColorPalette.title: ColorPalette
ColorPalette.description: Represents a color palette with light and dark theme colors.

id.description: Unique identifier for the color palette.

name.description: Name of the color palette (e.g., 'Default', 'Cool Blue').

description.description: A brief description of the color palette.

Color.title: Color
Color.description: Represents a single color token with light and dark mode values.

role.description: The role of the color (e.g., 'Page background', 'Brand color').

light.description: The color value for light mode (e.g., '#F8FAFC').

dark.description: The color value for dark mode (e.g., '#0B1220').

definition.description: Stores color palettes owned by a specific user.
Stores individual color tokens within a color palette.
